name: iONE360  configurator
author: Colijn-IT

sections.description:
iONE360 offers visual commerce without bounds: our visual product configurator can handle any type of mass-customizable product regardless of industry, size and complexity.

Users can create configurations themselves and can add 3D assets, which is then translated to an easy step-by-step guided selling process that can be embedded in other applications. The iONE360 configurator plugin for WordPress and WooCommerce adds the configurator template when adding a page making specific products able to be shown in 3D.
The plugin also adds functionality for adding 3D capabillities to products and customizing the add to cart process to adapt the prices to configuration that are made.

Now, even consumers can customize complex products without mistakes and can properly see products before making expensive purchases. Sales value goes up and delivered products will match expectations, which means: less returns, less waste and happy customers! What are you waiting for?

The plugin with demo functionality can be downloaded and used for free. For integration with (your own) products from iONE, a quote must be requested. Please contact sales@ione360.com for more information.
sections.installation: For a full guide with screenshots on how to install and use this plugin, please read the user documentation.

short_description: We help your customers make better decisions by bridging the imagination gap.

screenshots.caption:
This is what the configurator looks like when you place it in a template. You are able to switch between 2D and 3D
renders of the product, and change the selections to your liking.
